fieldUpdates.description: the system will automatically check the box for BypassZuoraIntegration for these related locations
fieldUpdates.name: Bypass True
Copy SF Subscription ID to Subscription

fieldUpdates.description: The Late Fee Waived date field is blank, this action update it with the actual date.
fieldUpdates.name: LateFeeWaivedIsBlank

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'In Progress'), IF(ISPICKVAL(Service_Jurisdiction__c, 'BRIGHT'), IF(BRIGHT_LoginName__c == null, SF_Subscription_ID__c, BRIGHT_LoginName__c), BRIGHT_LoginName__c),BRIGHT_LoginName__c)
fieldUpdates.name: Populate BRIGHT Login Name

fieldUpdates.description: Request Late Fee Waiver value is False (no previous demand or request), update value of this field to true
fieldUpdates.name: RequestLateFeeWaivedBoxIsUnchecked

fieldUpdates.description: Set Subscription: Service Jurisdiction default value to MRIS
fieldUpdates.name: SJ: Set Default for Subscription

rules.description: {"SJ":"BRIGHT","BJ":"No Jurisdiction","TE": "AutoSuspended","BE":"suspended for non-payment","Des":" where the status status inactive reason is suspended for non payment"}
If no value is set for Billing Jurisdiction, MRIS is set to default(like ezjoin processes)

rules.fullName: Bright Sussex or Coastal Preview Welcome Letter

rules.description: for NVR1 and DRBR1 related location must bypass Zuora integration and notify Finance.
Copy Mailing Address to Billing Address

rules.fullName: Copy SF Subscription ID to Subscription ID
rules.description: This also includes populating Initial Subscription and Quarterly Fees.
Sends an outbound message to update the LMS.
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Active') && NOT(ISCHANGED(Status__c)) && (ISCHANGED( Nickname__c ) || ISCHANGED( Subscription_Type__c ) || ISCHANGED( QAS_Mailing_County__c ) || ISCHANGED( Related_Location_Broker_Office__c ) || ISCHANGED( Primary_Phone__c ) || ISCHANGED( Private_Email__c ) || ISCHANGED( State__c ) || ISCHANGED( Contact_Last_Name__c ) || ISCHANGED( Contact_Nickname__c ) || ISCHANGED( Resend_to_LMS_Flag__c ))

rules.description: Sends an outbound message to update the LMS.
Sends an outbound message to update the LMS.
Sends an outbound message to update the LMS.

criteriaItems.value: To be filled in when saved

rules.formula: AND( Primary__c = TRUE, OR( ISCHANGED( Primary_Phone__c ) , ISCHANGED( Voicemail__c ) , ISCHANGED( VM_Ext__c ) , ISCHANGED( Mobile_Phone__c ) , ISCHANGED( Home_Fax__c ) , ISCHANGED( Agent_Office_Phone__c ), ISCHANGED( Fax__c ), ISCHANGED( Website__c ), ISCHANGED( Public_Email__c ) , ISCHANGED( Private_Email__c ) ) )

AND( Primary__c = TRUE, OR( ISCHANGED( Addl_Display_Name__c ) , ISCHANGED( Box__c ) , ISCHANGED( City__c ) , ISCHANGED( Country__c ) , ISCHANGED( County__c ) , ISCHANGED( State__c ), ISCHANGED( Street_Direction__c ), ISCHANGED( Street_Name__c ), ISCHANGED( Street_Number__c ) , ISCHANGED( Street_Number_Suffix__c ) , ISCHANGED( Street_Type__c ) , ISCHANGED( Unit__c ) , ISCHANGED( Unit_Type__c ) , ISCHANGED( Zip__c ) , ISCHANGED( Zip_4__c ) ) )

rules.description: {"SJ":"MRIS,TREND","BJ":"No Jurisdiction","TE": "AutoSuspended","BE":"suspended for non-payment","Des":" where the status status inactive reason is suspended for non payment"}
If no value is set for Service Jurisdiction, MRIS is set to default(like ezjoin processes)

rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c),"In Progress")), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Inactive"), OR(ISPICKVAL(Service_Jurisdiction__c, "TREND"), ISPICKVAL(Service_Jurisdiction__c, "BRIGHT")) )

rules.description: Sends an outbound message to update the LMS.
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( Nickname__c ) || ISCHANGED( Subscription_Type__c ) || ISCHANGED( QAS_Mailing_County__c ) || ISCHANGED( Related_Location_Broker_Office__c ) || ISCHANGED( Primary_Phone__c ) || ISCHANGED( Private_Email__c ) || ISCHANGED( State__c ) || ISCHANGED( Contact_Last_Name__c )
